<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a room in the "Rooms" section based on the template.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["templateId","title"],"type":"object","properties":{"templateId":{"type":"integer","description":"The template ID from which the room to be created.","format":"int32","example":1234},"title":{"type":"string","description":"The room title.","nullable":true,"example":"legacy_1080p_small_wooden_mouse"},"logo":{"type":"object","properties":{"tmpFile":{"type":"string","description":"The path to the temporary image file.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"x":{"type":"integer","description":"The X coordinate of the rectangle starting point.","format":"int32","example":1234},"y":{"type":"integer","description":"The Y coordinate of the rectangle starting point.","format":"int32","example":1234},"width":{"type":"integer","description":"The rectangle width.","format":"int32"},"height":{"type":"integer","description":"The rectangle height.","format":"int32"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The logo request parameters.","title":"LogoRequest"},"copyLogo":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to copy a logo or not.","example":true},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"The collection of tags.","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]},"color":{"maxLength":6,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The color of the room to be created.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"cover":{"maxLength":50,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The cover of the room to be created.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"quota":{"type":"integer","description":"Room quota","format":"int64","nullable":true,"example":1234}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The parameters for creating a room from a template.","title":"CreateRoomFromTemplateDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
